#include<stdio.h>

long int hcf(long int n,long int m){
    //printf("x%ld %ld\n",n,m);
    if(n == 0)
        return m;
    return hcf(m%n,n);
}
int main(){
    long int tc,n,m,lcm,nn,mm;
    long long int pro,ans1,ans2,ans;
    scanf("%ld",&tc);
    while(tc--){
        scanf("%ld%ld",&n,&m);
        if(n==1 || m==1){
            ans = n>=m?n:m;
            printf("%ld\n",ans);
            continue;
        }
        n--;m--;
        //printf("z%ld\n",hcf(n,m));
        nn = n/hcf(n,m);
        mm = m/hcf(n,m);
        pro = nn*mm;
        ans1 = n/nn;
        ans2 = m/mm;
        ans = ans1 >= ans2?ans1:ans2;
        printf("%lld\n",ans+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
